    FlyingMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a fly move, that allows them to not take damage in the next turn.

    void
    Monster.makeMove(Monster enemy)
    For the base Monster there is only one attack possible, dealing damage to the enemy.
    void
    Player.makeMove(Monster enemy)
    Takes player input to choose which move to make out of attack, use item, switch monster and flee.
    void

    Same as makeMove but random.
    void
    Monster.makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)

    void
